price: خو بيا چې هغه كړاو درنه لرې كړي، يو دم ستاسو څه خلک خپل رب سره شريكان نيسي.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا كَشَفَ ٱلضُّرَّ عَنكُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنكُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: thumma idhā kashafa al-ḍura ʿankum idhā farīqun minkum birabbihim yush'rikūna
